co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

Interface WorkflowInfoProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CustomActionContext, MapReduceContext, SparkClientContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaSparkExecutionContext

    public interface WorkflowInfoProvider
    Interface for providing information about WorkflowInfo.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkflowInfo getWorkflowInfo() 
      WorkflowToken getWorkflowToken() 

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkflowToken

        @Nullable
WorkflowToken getWorkflowToken()
        Returns:
        the WorkflowToken associated with the current Workflow, if the program is executed as a part of the Workflow; returns null otherwise.

      • getWorkflowInfo

        @Nullable
WorkflowInfo getWorkflowInfo()
        Returns:
        information about the enclosing Workflow run, if the program is executed as a part of the Workflow; returns null otherwise.
